popt4jlib.MSSC

Class KMeansCC

  • java.lang.Object
    • popt4jlib.MSSC.KMeansCC
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClustererInitIntf

    public class KMeansCC
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClustererInitIntf
    implements the KMeans|| method for seeds initialization for the K-Means algorithm. Multi-threaded implementation assumes that data-set fits in main memory.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011-2018

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou

      auxiliary nested class, not part of the public API.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int[] _asgn 
      private java.util.Set _CInd
      _Cind is the set of indices indicating which of the data in the list _data are included in the current set C.
      private java.util.List _data
      _data is the array of data points to be clustered.
      private int _l
      _l is the parameter lambda in K-Means|| algorithm.
      private static Messenger _mger 
      private double[] _minPtDist2FromC
      for the current set of centers C, _minPtDist2FromC[i] is the quantity d(_data[i],C)^2.
      private int _nthreads
      the number of threads to use.
      private int _numrounds
      the number of rounds to iterate, if it's positive, else use the logy value.
      private double[] _pfs 
      private double[] _w

      • _minPtDist2FromC

        for the current set of centers C, _minPtDist2FromC[i] is the quantity d(_data[i],C)^2.

        _l is the parameter lambda in K-Means|| algorithm.

    • Constructor Detail

      • KMeansCC

        public KMeansCC(java.util.List datapts,
                int lambda,
                int numthreads,
                int numrounds)
        sole constructor.
        Parameters:
        datapts - List // List<VectorIntf>
        lambda - int the parameter of the algorithm
        numthreads - int the number of threads to use
        numrounds - int if this is positive, denotes the number of rounds to run the main KMeansCC iteration instead of the logy number.

    • Method Detail

      • getInitialCenters

        public java.util.List getInitialCenters(int k)
        the main method of the class. Implements the K-Means|| algorithm as described in the paper "Scalable K-Means++" by Bahmani, Moseley, Vattani Kumar and Vassilvitskii, Proc. of the VLDB Endowment, 2012.
        Specified by:
        getInitialCenters in interface ClustererInitIntf
        Parameters:
        k - int
        Returns:
        List // List<VectorIntf>
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if k>n, the number of data points to be clustered, or if k≤0.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        test-driver method for KMeansCC, to to be used as part of the public API. Usage: java -cp <classpath> popt4jlib.MSSC.KMeansCC <input_vectors_file> <k> <lambda> [numthreads(4)] [numrounds(-1)] [dbglvl(Integer.MAX_VALUE->print all msgs)] .
        Parameters:
        args -
